title: Crime Alert 10.25.19
itunes:title: Crime Alert 10.25.19
description:
A 94 year-old turns himself in for killing his wife. Coach assaults a ref in a rec football league.


This week's podcast is sponsored by the new Wondery podcast Bad Batch. https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/bad-batch/id1482851200

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
